MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL68 postcode area of Carraglefyn , affecting properties in Carreg, Tyddyn Prys and surrounding area  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:37 AM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 9 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:33 PM on 30th October 2020.
